meanings.definition: Used to refer to the person or people that the speaker is addressing.
meanings.sent1: Can you please pass the salt?
meanings.sent3: You make the best cookies in town!
meanings.sent4: In a sea of faces, you shine the brightest.
meanings.sent5: You hold the key to my heart.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to any person in general.
meanings.sent1: When you go to the store, remember to buy milk.
meanings.sent2: You never know what life will bring.
meanings.sent3: You can't have your cake and eat it too!
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, you are the main character.
meanings.sent5: You are the star of your own story.
